content.body: Has there ever been discussion of adding _very common_ functions to the standard. In particular `noop` and `identity`? Is a palatable to propose adding something like `Function.noop` and `Function.identity` to the standard, so people stop creating `() => {}` and `x => x` over and over in their libraries and codebases?
